show.subtitle: Connect the Dots promotes health activism, linking personal health to the health of our culture, society, and environment.
show.title: Connect The Dots

title: Real Economics of Fracking
content: Today on Connect the Dots at 10 AM ET on the Progressive Radio Network, Huffington and Alternet reporter and program… host, Alison Rose Levy speaks about frackonomics— the real economics of fracking–  with financial analyst, Deborah Rogers, who founded the Energy Policy Forum ( http://energypolicyforum.com/) On Thursday, September 20th, Bill McKibben and Rogers will headline Shale Gas Outrage, (www.shalegasoutrage.org ) a rally and march in Philadelphia to “stop dirty gas drilling and protect air, water, earth and human health.”
